title: POCO launches its first smartwatch and the Buds Pro Genshin Impact Edition alongside the POCO F4 GT
content:
POCO launched its latest affordable flagship, the POCO F4 GT, today. The device is essentially a rebranded Redmi K50G that was launched in China earlier this year. It features Qualcomm’s Snapdragon 8 Gen 1 chip, a 6.67-inch FHD+ 120Hz AMOLED display, a 4,700mAh battery with 120W fast charging support, and a bunch of other cool

The post POCO launches its first smartwatch and the Buds Pro Genshin Impact Edition alongside the POCO F4 GT appeared first on XDA.
description: POCO has launched its first smartwatch -- the POCO Watch -- and the POCO Buds Pro Genshin Impact Edition alongside the POCO F4 GT.
